bridge-type.label: Velux KLF200 Bridge
bridge-type.description: This bridge connects to a Velux KLF200 device running firmware version 2.x.

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: IP / Hostname
parameter.description: The IP address or Hostname of the KLF200 that you want to connect to.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: If you have not changed the password, it is the wlan password printed on the underside of the KLF200 unit.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Socket Port
parameter.description: The port that the unit is listening on. By default, 51200.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Period
parameter.description: Frequency (in minutes) of the refresh interval.
